thread.title: Kym Marsh defends Danny Dyer after EastEnders star takes a break - "There can be a lot of stress"
thread.title_full: Kym Marsh defends Danny Dyer after EastEnders star takes a break - "There can be a lot of stress"

author: Katie Fitzpatrick
title: Kym Marsh defends Danny Dyer after EastEnders star takes a break - "There can be a lot of stress"
text:
Kym Marsh sympathises with Danny Dyer (Photo: REX) Share Get   
Kym Marsh has come to Danny Dyer's defence as the actor takes a break from the long-running soap. 
The Coronation Street actress has said says she understands the pressures of being part of a soap. 
Kym, who plays show favourite Michelle Connor, has her say on the matter in this week’s OK! magazine after it was revealed EastEnders bosses have given Danny time off from his role as Mick Carter on the BBC1 show. 
She said: “There can be a lot of stress working on a soap, so I understand. Danny is currently taking a break from the soap (Photo: Getty) (Photo: BBC) 
“It vexes me when the odd troll has said I haven’t got a ‘real job’. 
“Some people think we come into work, have our make-up done and muck around, but it’s not like that – we all work really hard. 
“Filming the number of episodes we make a week is tough. I’ve been on Corrie for 11 years and I manage the pressure well. 
“I know Danny’s hugely popular, so I hope he gets back to work soon – ‘Enders fans will really miss him.” 
Kym is currently at the centre of the drama on Corrie as barmaid Michelle, who lost her son Ruairi at 23 weeks of pregnancy in harrowing scenes and last week discovered that her husband Steve McDonald had fathered a baby with their neighbour Leanne Battersby. 
Kym, who decided to take on the emotional storyline after suffering the loss of her son Archie at 21 weeks of pregnancy, has been widely praised for her portrayal of grieving Michelle. Kym Marsh (Photo: WENN.com) 
Kym has also told OK! that Good Morning Britain host Piers Morgan is “far too posh” for a role in Corrie after he joked recently that he could play her love interest in the soap after declaring she wants a divorce from Steve. 
Read the full story in this week’s OK! Magazine out now. Like us on Facebook
